results.t: Do you think Slimjet browser is safe enough to make it main?
results.p: I have never tried Slimjet, but its web page looks very suspicious to me and generates a lot of distrust. It looks like malware at a glance.

results.t: why do i have problems downloading from slimjet ...
results.p: Check for Transcoding Software: If you previously installed a transcoding program for video downloads, it might be causing the problem.
